TopicTitle: What was the president quote for the apollo 1 tragedy?

Articles.Content:
Hi!

What was the president quote for the apollo 1 tragedy(RIP Grissom,Chaffee and White).

I remember there was something like this: "Let's not remeber them for how they died,but for the...."

I don't remember the end of the quote,anyone remember it?

Thank you for reading!

Edited September 30, 2013 by goldenpeach
The auto corrector seem to have played a trick on me.

I was able to find the quote in a memorial video NASA put together: "Remember them not for how they died but for those ideals for which they lived." The video is on YouTube and is titled "Day of Remembrance - Apollo 1". I hope it is that for which you were looking.

Not sure about the president but here is the investigation report : http://klabs.org/richcontent/Reports/Failure_Reports/as-204/senate_956/index.htm

It has some beautiful words on page 3.
